channel.title: Need a Roat pkz cheat client

item.title: Need a Roat pkz cheat client
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

[quote=“TeamRubidium, post:5, topic:543921”][quote author=dutchscape69 link=topic=662803.msg4440453#msg4440453 date=1406460814]
I got a roadpkz cc i only ask some items ingame u can dupe and much more
[/quote]

  1. You can’t dupe with an especially big server like RoatPkz with packet spoofing. Item spawning (Which is what I’m working on) is hard enough. You’d need some serious holes in the source code to exploit it.
  2. 99% RoatPkz cheat clients are fake because the client has been obfuscated almost from the start. You’d need somebody on the inside with VPS/FTP access to leak the source code.
  3. Nice try.[/quote]
    Sorry for gravedig but I duped there only a few weeks ago. You can dupe on quite many servers, biggest ones have most of them fixed but always new ones pop up. And rsps sources are really bugged by default, its quite hard to fix them.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Roat pkz cheat client

@TeamRubidium wrote:

I got a roadpkz cc i only ask some items ingame u can dupe and much more

  2. 99% RoatPkz cheat clients are fake because the client has been obfuscated almost from the start. You’d need somebody on the inside with VPS/FTP access to leak the source code.
